content: Investments Asked by AnonymousAsked on 03 Dec 2018Is affiliate marketing moonlighting for NSFs?I’m finding ways to start an extra source of cashflow. What’s your suggestion?1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Lok Yang TengLevel 6. MasterUpdated on 07 Jun 2019NSFs are not allowed to undertake salaried or contract employment, or run a business while serving their full-time NS commitments. I recommend you not do anything until you ORD even if you're not paid CPF for that (unrecorded).1 comment0
Question Poster03 Dec 2018Okay, I will take that advice
